commands.name: az iot central device twin replace
commands.summary: Replace writable property values of a device, a device component or a device module or a device module component.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device twin replace --app-id
                                   --content
                                   --device-id
                                   [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                   [--central-api-uri]
                                   [--co]
                                   [--mn]
                                   [--token]
examples: az iot central device twin replace --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} -k {content}
az iot central device twin replace --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --co {componentname} -k {content}
az iot central device twin replace --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --mn {modulename} --co {componentname} -k {content}

commands.name: az iot central device twin show
commands.summary: Get all property values of a device, a device component, a device module or a device module component.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device twin show --app-id
                                --device-id
                                [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                [--central-api-uri]
                                [--co]
                                [--mn]
                                [--token]
examples: az iot central device twin show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid}
az iot central device twin show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --co {componentname}
az iot central device twin show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --mn {modulename} --co {componentname}

commands.name: az iot central device twin update
commands.summary: Update writable property values of a device, a device component, a device module or a device module component.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device twin update --app-id
                                  --content
                                  --device-id
                                  [--api-version {2022-06-30-preview, 2022-07-31}]
                                  [--central-api-uri]
                                  [--co]
                                  [--mn]
                                  [--token]
examples: az iot central device twin update --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} -k {content}
az iot central device twin update --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --co {componentname} -k {content}
az iot central device twin update --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceid} --mn {modulename} --co {componentname} -k {content}
